duties_responsibilities.duty: Dive deep into customer specifications and collaborate closely with Sécheron HQ in Geneva, Switzerland to select the perfect product fit.
Analyze unique customer requirements, providing expert technical guidance.
Extend unparalleled support to our local Sécheron sales representative, empowering them with technical insights.
Bridge the gap between our customers and the Geneva Office, effectively communicating technical details and needs.
Deliver outstanding after-sales and quality support, ensuring customer satisfaction remains our top priority.

education_certification.credential: University degree in electrical, electromechanical or micro-engineering.
